title: vishhNu vaahanuNDidhigO
sahitya:
viSNu vAhanuNDidigO veDale jUDarE

anupallavi

 krSNa caraNa bhaktulalO kIrti galgu bhAgyashAli

caraNam 1

 ranga patini bongucu hrd-rangamunanu dalaci bangAru sari rangugala patanga rAju tAnanucu
   
caraNam 2

 varuNAlaya moraliDa vini karuNA pUrituDai hari bhaktula paritApamu hariyintu nanucu vEDkaga
   
caraNam 3

 rAjillu virAjAdhipuDi jagamunakEgi ahi rAjabhOji tyAgarAja nutuni tA pogaDucu
